metadata.title: CVE-2024-9391 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A user who enables full-screen mode on a specially crafted web page couldpotentially be prevented from exiting full screen mode.  This may allowspoofing of other sites as the address bar is no longer visible.*This bug only affects Firefox Focus for Android. Other versions of Firefoxare unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox < 131.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
